Txt_Talk_GarunaTower_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: Life is a pilgrimage in search of wisdom and truth. Welcome, pilgrim, to the Tower of Transcendence.

Txt_Talk_GarunaTower_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: Apparently, there's a scroll somewhere in this tower called the <6>Words of Wisdom<9>.
*: If what they say is true, just reading it would be enough to turn even me into a sage!

Txt_Talk_GarunaTower_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310.Text: *: Oi! Leave me alone, will you? I'm trying to meditate here!

Txt_Talk_GarunaTower_2F_SUB_0_VOLUME_041.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
